Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone! I'm very excited! Today I've released my first ever created text adventure game: The Mannequin Mystery. I started out a little over a month ago with absolutely no coding knowledge, but I always wanted to create a text adventure game and I'm very happy to have found this platform. The community has been incredibly supportive and very helpful. I invite all of you to try my game and see what you think. Enjoy!
Posts.HTML:
Hi everyone!

I'm very excited! Today I've released my first ever created text adventure game: The Mannequin Mystery.

I started out a little over a month ago with absolutely no coding knowledge, but I always wanted to create a text adventure game and I'm very happy to have found this platform. The community has been incredibly supportive and very helpful. I invite all of you to try my game and see what you think.

Enjoy!
